artist: Artist: Toyohara Chikanobu; Publisher: Komori Sōjirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; battle scene; tent on left image with fallen figures in front on ground; two figures in hand-to-hand combat in center; figure on right with raised sword; groups of soldiers surrounded by white plumes of smoke in background; mountain in top center in center image
markings: 彫徳; 組合, 正商
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of the Fierce Battle at Taipingshan during the Sino-Japanese War
